title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
The highest category is found at VNPT where Market share is 56.6.
The lowest category is found at Others where Market share is 6.6.
The highest value at VNPT is almost 8.58 times larger than the minimum value of Others.
The highest value at VNPT is almost 8.58 times larger than the minimum value of Others.
The difference between the max Company VNPT and min Company Others is 50.0.
